productDescription:
In this collection Rolann aimed to visualize the main aspect of our brand, 'Made in Holland'

The lines that connect our heritage with contemporary streetwear form a subtle detail. Just like our roots are intertwined in our identity, the colours red, white and blue are intertwined in these items.

optionalInfo.fit:
Loose fit.

Male model: 1.83 and wears size M.
Female model: 1.78 and wears size XS.
optionalInfo.production: The garments are handmade by experienced men with a refugee background who are motivated to build a new life in Holland.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: Using our premium quality fabrics, combined with a loose fit, we designed an ultimately comfortable yet stylish piece.
